name: Joined Flight
description:
Joined Flight  is a relaxing game where you control two birds to activate beautiful music. 

Developed during the GMTK Game jam 2021, with Art made by WitchOfThisTown and Programming by Kevin Catlett. 

Focusing on amazing music by Anna Elu, Joined Flight hopes to bring you a positiv, meditative feeling. 

Thank you for giving Joined Flight a look. 

Gameplay:

Control both birds with the keyboard and follow their respective color of line to activate the soundtrack. 

Controls:

W - Move purple bird up

S - Move purple bird down

Up Arrow - Move blue bird up

Down Arrow - Move blue bird down

Escape - Pause Game
